1.content:
First off, who will gain?

(Sai can't gain, since he's... well... a ghost.)
1.title: Who?

11.content:
Hikaru walked towards the train station, hands in his pockets. He had recently finished lunch with the other insei, and was on his way home. As per usual, they had eaten at a fast food restaurant.

"Hikaru," a voice called out.

Hikaru stopped. "Sai?"

Sai materialized behind him. "Hikaru, maybe next time you should suggest a different place to eat to your friends."

Hikaru blinked. "Huh? Why?"

"All that fast food you're eating is starting to affect your body." Sai emphasized his point by poking Hikaru's stomach with his fan.

Hikaru flushed. "S-sai! Cut that out!" He covered his stomach with his arms. Sai was right, however. It was difficult to see, but Hikaru's stomach had grown a little rounder, a little bigger, owing to the amount of fast food he had been eating.

Hikaru rolled his eyes. "Sai, I'll eat what I want, okay?"

Sai shook his head, sighing. "Fine, fine..."

Sighing in frustration, Hikaru continued walking.

However, he stopped short when he saw a ramen shop with a sign reading, "Ramen eating contest."

Hikaru grinned. "Wow!" He started running towards it.

Sai waved his arms frantically. "H-hikaru, wait!"

Still running, Hikaru smiled. "It's okay, Sai. I'll still be able to make the train."

"That's not what I..." Sai began. He shook his head. "Never mind..."

When Hikaru got reached the ramen shop, he saw a price list. "Huh? What's this?" he asked the clerk.

"Oh, those are the different contests," the clerk told him. "There are twenty-minute, 30-minute, and 50-minute eating contests. The prizes for winning one are several weeks of free ramen, depending on the contest."

"Really?!" Hikaru asked, excited. He liked fast food, but he liked Ramen even more. "All right, sign me up!"

Which contest does Hikaru register for?
11.title: Hikaru Shindo

choices: Hikaru becomes stuffed and can't eat anymore
Hikaru finishes, and he's come in first place
111.content:
After paying for the 20 minute contest, Hikaru was led into a room. There was a single table and a chair waiting for him.

Confused, Hikaru turned to his guide. "Where are the other contestants?"

Instead of answering, the guide pointed to a chart on the wall. There was a list of names on the chart, each with a number next to them. The guide spoke. "The way we do it here is, you pay for a contest, and, if you eat more than the person at the top," he gestured to the chart, "you win 2 weeks of free ramen."

Hikaru's face lit up. "When do I start?!"

The guide smiled. "Right now!"

He led Hikaru to his seat, then walked out, only to return with a tray filled with at least ten very large bowls of ramen before leaving again. Hikaru prepared to dig in.

Suddenly, Sai appeared behind Hikaru. "Hikaru, I don't think this is a good idea. What if you get sick from eating all that ramen?"

Hikaru laughed. "Don't worry, Sai. I can do this!"

Without wasting anymore time, Hikaru dug in. Within five minutes, Hikaru had cleared out at least half of the bowls. His stomach had swelled considerably, pressing against his shirt.

Heedless of this, Hikaru prepared to dig into another bowl when he suddenly groaned.

"Hikaru! Are you alright?" Sai asked worriedly.

Seemingly ignoring Sai, Hikaru bent down and hurriedly undid his pants button and zipper, causing his stomach to bulge out a bit.

"That's better," Hikaru sighed in relief. Without further ado, he began tucking into the remaining ramen, even while the guide brought in more ramen.

"More ramen?" Hikaru stared happily at the bowls. "I love this contest!"
111.title: 20-minute contest

choices: Hikaru wakes up a few hours later and finds that it's almost dark
1111.content:
"Ooohhh... I'm so stuffed..." Hikaru groaned, holding his engorged belly. He'd managed an additional six bowls before his stomach just couldn't take any more, and he now concentrated on rubbing his belly, attempting to soothe the uncomfortable tightness he was feeling.

His stomach had bloated to a few inches in front of his body, briefly reminding Hikaru of the cartoons he would sometimes watch. His pants felt uncomfortably tight, even though they were undone. His shirt, unable to fully contain his stuffed belly, had ridden up, exposing his stomach and navel (much to his embarrasment) for the whole world to see. All in all, he was quite a sight to see, shirt up, stomach bloated, and rubbing his stomach, which produced a pleasurable feeling that Hikaru couldn't help but give a sigh of contentment at, even as he groaned in discomfort.

Wincing, Hikaru staggered up out of his chair, and slowly made his way to the door, pushing his way out. Once outside, he tried pulling his shirt down over his belly, but every time he brought it down, it just sprung back up again.

Hikaru groaned in frustration, continuing to rub his belly. Sai materialized behind Hikaru, but seeing that he wasn't exactly in the mood for talking, the ancient Go master simply stared reproachfully at Hikaru's bloated belly.

Ignoring Sai, Hikaru stumbled along the sidewalk, drawing shocked looks from passerby. He didn't pay attention to them. Eventually, he came across a bench. Sighing in relief, he collapsed down onto it, running his hands up and down his stomach and smiling in contentment. Before long, he found his eyelids growing heavy, and he fell asleep- completely forgetting that he was supposed to go home.


What happens next?
1111.title: Hikaru becomes stuffed and can't eat anymore

choices: Hikaru sees somewhere else that he wants to eat
11111.content:
"Ngh..." Hikaru moaned, coming to. A thin line of drool trailed from the side of his mouth, which he quickly wiped away.

He stretched his arms in a yawn, then leaned back and sighed, massaging the bloated mass that was now his stomach. His stomach was still swollen, but it no longer hurt. Hikaru smiled, rubbing his belly with both hands, letting the cool night air flow over it.

Wait a minute...

Hikaru's eyes shot open. "What?!" He looked about frantically; it was dusk. "S-Sai! How long was I out?"

Hikaru's companion appeared beside him. "A few hours, I think. Your gorging must have tired you out."

Hikaru yelled in surprise. "Why didn't you wake me?!"

Sai shook his head. "Believe me, I tried..." he began, beginning to poke Hikaru's exposed belly with his fan, eliciting a deep blush from the boy. "But it would appear that you are a rather heavy sleeper."

Hikaru smacked a hand to his forehead. "Aw, man, this can't be happening..." He groaned. He looked up at the sky. "I'm going to get in so much trouble for this..."

Hikaru's self-pitying tirade was interrupted by a growling noise: Hikaru's stomach.

The sound caused both Hikaru and Sai to jump. "You're already hungry again?"

Hikaru laughed nervously, scratching a cheek with a finger. "Well, it has been a while..." He looked up at Sai. "I'll probably get home late anyway, so..." Hikaru turned his head. "Let's go. I know this burger place that's open all day." Before Sai could protest, he began walking off. As he did so, he re-buttoned and re-zipped his pants, and pulled his shirt as far down as it would go over his belly. However, a fair amount of skin, about up to his belly button, still showed.

Sai re-materialized next to him. "Hikaru, why are you trying to fix your clothes up?"

Hikaru shrugged. "Well, if I walk around with my pants open and my belly sticking out, I'd look kind of weird, wouldn't I?" He laughed, then clutched his belly in pain; his shorts were uncomfortably tight. He got over it quickly, though, and continued on his way.

After a few minutes...
11111.title: Hikaru wakes up a few hours later and finds tha...

choices: Three days later, Hikaru's card is lost so he goes to a burger joint.
Watching him eat ramen for a week, the Chef wants Hikaru to be his protegee.
At two weeks end, Hikaru decides to enter another contest for more ramen.
1112.content:
"Oooh...so much ramen," said Hikaru, groaning as the contest ended fifteen minutes later.

"Oh, Ho, Ho! Seventeen bowls of ramen. That's three more than the previous winner. You, my dear lad, have won this contest!" exclaimed the guide.

Walking up to Hikaru, he gave him a pat on the back before reaching into his own pockets and pulling out a laminated card.

"This is your reward. This card will allow you to have as much ramen as you want for the next two weeks. Just make sure to show us the card when you come in."

Hikaru just nodded, unable to talk much do to his fully stuffed stomach. As it was, he was currently in his seat, shirt up and pants unbuttoned, rubbing his gut in an attempt to help him digest and therefore, relieve some of the discomfort he was feeling.

Wanting just to go home and get some rest, he quickly took the card, and then proceeded to stumble out of the restaurant in a food-induced haze. Making his way to the train station, he thought of all the ramen he was going to have for the next few weeks as he sat down on a chair, waiting for his train to arrive.
1112.title: Hikaru finishes, and he's come in first place

choices: "Nah, that's OK; I think I'll just stick with the free ramen for now"
11122.content:
"Phew!" Hikaru exclaimed, slamming the now-empty ramen bowl on the table. "That was great!" He leaned back in his chair, closing his eyes and smiling. "All that ramen, all for free...and this is only the first week!" He grinned, rubbing his full belly.

Sai materialized, gaping at the empty bowls dotting the table. "Hikaru...how many bowls did you just..."

Hikaru's eyes flew open, and he leaned forward slightly to take a closer look. "Hmm... let's see..." His face abruptly broke out in a grin. "Twenty-two bowls! Alright! New record!" He laughed, patting his stomach. "Playing Go isn't the only thing I'm great at!"

"Indeed!" The chef walked out of the kitchen, throwing an approving glance at the bowls stacked on the table. "You certainly have quite the stomach, my boy!"

Hikaru turned his head to look at the man. "Thanks!" He burped suddenly, and his hand flew to his mouth. "Excuse me... Yeah, the ramen here's really good! Not to mention..." he looked down at his stomach, a thoughtful look on his face. "It's actually sorta fun, watching my stomach get like this." The chef followed his eyes.

As it had been that first day, Hikaru's stomach had been stuffed to its limit; it now had a decidedly round appearance, as opposed to the fairly flat state it had been in when he'd come in earlier that day. His shirt had pulled up a good distance over his stomach, exposing the stretched skin, as well as resting a good several inches above his navel. His shorts, similarly, had been unbuttoned midway through his session; as a result, his stomach had pushed out a bit more, taking full advantage of the breathing room. In addition, his zipper had been slowly forced down by the growing stomach, and was now completely undone. This, Hikaru noticed with a flush of embarrassment, had resulted in the bright white cloth of his briefs peeking out.

The chef chuckled. "I'm glad you feel that way."

Hikaru glanced up at the man, confused. "Mister?"

"Listen, I'm thinking about trying out some new varieties of ramen, and I'd like YOU to be my taste tester. You get to try some delicious new noodles, AND you still get to take advantage of the rest of your free ramen time." The man smiled. "What do you say, lad?"

Hikaru thought it over for a minute, stroking his exposed belly. Then, he looked up at the man, took a breath, and said...
11122.title: Watching him eat ramen for a week, the Chef wan...

choices: Hikaru finishes the entire pot, and it's time for a new flavor.
Hikaru gets full before he can finish it.
111221.content:
Upon hearing Hikaru's confirmation, the chef replied enthusiastically, saying, "Great! You'll start tomorrow!" Hikaru was finished with today's binge, however, so he decided to lumber over to the train station, his full belly wobbling quite a bit in the process.

Sai then materialized and walked next to Hikaru, and he was concerned, asking Hikaru "Did you just accept that job? You know there is such a thing as too much ramen!"

"Don't worry, Sai. I don't think I can ever have too much ramen!" was Hikaru's simple response. Sai was only somewhat quelled by that response, but he knew that he would be unable to convince Hikaru otherwise.

Either way, as Hikaru slept on the train home, he dreamed of his new job, eating tons of ramen to his delight. His dreams would soon some true.

The next day, Hikaru arrived at the ramen shop, and the chef eagerly walked up to him. "Good! My new taste tester is here! Are you ready to start?" Hikaru nodded eagerly, and the chef beckoned him into the kitchen.

"I have quite a few varieties for you to try. I'll give you a sample bowl, and you tell me your thoughts. Unfortunately, because it is a test pot, I can't sell it to my customers, so you'll have to finish all of it yourself." Hikaru only seemed to get more excited by this as the chef picked up a pot of ramen, carrying it with him as he took Hikaru back outside.

In the actual restaurant part, there was a table with a chair reserved, with a sign saying "Taste Tester" on the table. The chef motioned for Hikaru to sit down, and he did.

"Here is the first sample: Sausage Ramen." The chef declared as he placed the large pot of ramen onto the table. He then got a bowl and chopsticks, as well as a ladle, and told Hikaru to dig in.

Hikaru took the cue, and he ladled himself some noodles and broth. He took a taste, and it was amazing. Hikaru dug in at a much faster pace, managing to say, "It's fantastic!" before slurping up noodles with excitement. Soon he had finished the bowl, and the chef watched, awestruck, as he pulled the entire pot over to himself, and began pulling noodles out with his chopsticks.

He ate with gusto, his stomach beginning to distend yet again after a while.
111221.title: "Sure! That sounds great!"

choices: Hikaru goes to the restaurant, but he meets someone
Sai breaks the news to him
11123.content:
"Aww man, the card's expired already!" Hikaru complained when he realized that today he wouldn't be able to eat for free at his favorite place.

"You knew it would only last two weeks, and it might be for the best." Sai said calmly.

"What do you mean?" Hikaru inquired.

"Nothing, nothing. It's just that eating the same thing everyday isn't very healthy" 'Especially in the quantities you do' Sai added to himself.

"But ramen is the best food ever!" Hikaru exclaimed, "In fact, I'm going to go to the eating contest again to get another card!"

"Hikaru, I seriously doubt that is a wise decision. I think you've been having too much ramen." Sai said.

"There is no such thing as too much ramen, at least not for me! Just like with go for you." Hikaru explained.

But Hikaru's statement was a bit off. Even if he hadn't noticed it, it seemed like he had indeed eaten too much ramen, and it showed. Hikaru's body had plumped up; he had developed a pair of chubby cheeks and a slight double chin. His arms had the little definition they had and were now thicker and jiggly, and so were his legs, which now sported a pair of thick thighs. His chest had become soft and pudgy, not boy boobs yet, by quite a bit, but it was there. His belly was now round and jiggly, chubby enough for it to poke from under his now somewhat tight t-shirt. His pants weren't doing much better, at they dug deeply into his belly and were strained by his plump rear, which jiggled whenever his walking turned into a jog.

Hikaru was somehow blissfully unaware of this fact, but Sai wasn't, and he didn't know how to tell Hikaru. One thing was saying he had put on a couple of pounds, and another was telling him he was about to become more than chubby.

"C'mon Sai, the ramen awaits us!" And with that, Hikaru headed towards the restaurant.
11123.title: At two weeks end, Hikaru decides to enter anoth...

112.content:
After signing up for the 30 minute contest, Hikaru was led to a table and told to wait. In a few minutes, a single bowl of ramen was brought to him. Confused, Hikaru looked at the man who had brought the bowl.

"Only one bowl?" he asked, perplexed. "I thought this was a contest."

The man nodded. "You'll get more," he said, and walked away.

Looking at his Ramen bowl, Hikaru shrugged and began eating. However, partway through, he started to feel sleepy. Confused, Hikaru tried to keep his eyes open, but the strength was starting to leave his body. In a few minutes, Hikaru collapsed face down in his ramen.

....................................

A couple hours later, Hikaru came to. "Huh? What happened..."

It was then that he realized that his hands were tied to the chair he was sitting in. Looking around, he saw that he was in some kind of darkened room, which was nonetheless nicely furnished.

"Hikaru! Where are we?" Sai cried in alarm as he materialized behind Hikaru.

"I don't know," Hikaru begin breathing rapidly in panic.

"Relax, Shindo. We've no wish to harm you." A voice suddenly rang out across the room.

A tall, white-haired man entered. He paused before speaking again. "You are in the feeding room."

Hikaru blinked. "The feeding room? What..."

The man chuckled. "It's exactly what it sounds like, Shindo." He snapped his fingers, and several men came in, each bearing enormous trays filled with the most delicious food Hikaru could fathom. Burgers, ice cream, soda... He began involuntarily drooling slightly.

Hikaru paused. This guy had kidnapped him! But... his stomach growled slightly. He WAS kind of hungry... and the guy DID say he didn't mean any harm...

The man smiled. "All right, Shindo-kun, what kind of food do you want first?"
112.title: The Feeding Room

choices: A different kind of junk food
1122.content:
"Um," Hikaru began sheepishly, "can I have some of those triple cheeseburgers?"

The man smiled and snapped his fingers again. "Attend to him," he told the servers before leaving.

Sai panicked. "Hikaru, what are you doing?! They could be poisoned, for all we know!"

Hikaru grinned. "Don't worry, Sai," he thought back. "He said they didn't want to hurt me, and I AM kind of hungry..."

Sai sighed and shrugged, before vanishing. He cared greatly for Hikaru, but he could be so reckless...

Hikaru smiled as the servers approached him. However, he suddenly realized something. "Wait a minute," he began, "how can I eat with my hands tied?"

"Like this," one of the men replied, before shoving a burger into Hikaru's mouth.

Hikaru gagged for a second, but when he realized the burger wasn't being shoved any further, he began chewing. As he ate small portions, the server pushed the burger further into his mouth, and Hikaru repeated it until the entire burger was gone. Afterwards, the server took out another burger, and Hikaru did what he did before. This was repeated a few times before Hikaru's waist began to get tight.

"Hold on," Hikaru held out his hand. "I'm starting to get full."

Nodding in understanding, one of the men held out another burger. "Eat this," he told Hikaru.

"But..."

"Trust us," the man said. Hikaru, still a little unsure, nodded his head, and ate the burger as before. He was shocked to find that, after finishing it, he felt hungry again.

"How..." he began.

"We'll tell you later," the man assured him. "For now, eat!"

Giving an unsure smile, Hikaru allowed himself to be fed more triple cheeseburgers. After ten of these treats, Hikaru's stomach had grown, pressing against his shorts uncomfortably. He winced.

Apparently, one of the servers noticed this. He set his tray down, walked over to Hikaru, and bent down, and, to Hikaru's shock, unbuttoned and unzipped Hikaru's pants.

Hikaru sighed in relief as his gut bulged out, no longer constrained by the undone shorts. His stomach was peeking out ever so slightly, which Hikaru noticed with slight amazement.

Amazingly, that wasn't enough for him.

"What do you want next, Shindo-kun?" one of the servers asked.

What food is Hikaru served next?
1122.title: Junk Foods

choices: After a few hours, the food digests, and the feeding starts again
11221.content:
"Uh, more burgers," Hikaru asked.

Nodding, the servers began feeding Hikaru more burgers, in the very same fashion as before.

As Hikaru took bites of the food offered to him, he couldn't help but grin; this wasn't so bad. These burgers were pretty good, and the servers were being surprisingly polite. He definitely wouldn't mind spending some more time here...

What was more, it was surprisingly fun watching his stomach. As time drew on and Hikaru ate burger after burger, it began to grow, slowly but surely. Every time it increased in size, a little bit more of his stomach peeked out. His shirt continued moving further up his swelling belly until, about an hour later, it rested nearly on top of his now-bloated stomach, several inches away from his belly button.

Hikaru stared at his belly, startled but somewhat amazed. Had he really eaten that much?

A few seconds later, he got another suprise: one of the servers came forward, crouched in front of Hikaru, and placed both hands on his stomach.

"Wha..." Hikaru's question quickly became a startled yelp as the man began moving his hands, rubbing the bloated appendage's exposed skin.

As the man carried on, Hikaru's shock quickly became contentment; that felt REALLY good.

Sighing happily, he settled back and closed his eyes, allowing his belly-massage to continue. He could get used to this...
11221.title: More burgers

choices: He releases Hikaru's restraints, giving him the option of being fed.
He explains the situation to Hikaru.
11222.content:
"Do you have any pizza?" Hikaru asked in response.

As if on cue, one of the servers came up to him with an extra large pepperoni pizza in each hand. Soon another server was taking the slices and directing them into Hikaru's mouth.

He tasted the pizza, finding it to be easily the most fantastic pizza he had eaten. He eagerly took more bites out of the pizza, enjoying the flavor, oblivious to the slow rising of his shirt to make room for his slowly distending stomach.

After one of the pizzas, Hikaru's shirt had risen up almost to his navel. Another pizza pushed his shirt about an inch above his navel, which now saw the light of day. Hikaru still remained oblivious as he downed even more pizza with gusto.

Sai couldn't even get Hikaru's attention, so he was forced to wait until Hikaru was out of his trance.

After Hikaru finished his third pizza, his shirt was nearly to the top of his unnaturally distended stomach. At this point in the feeding, another server began to gently rub his belly, causing him to relax as he gratefully accepted more food from his captors.

Soon, the man running the operation was back in the room to check on Hikaru.

"I knew that these subjects would be eager, but I never expected this!" He exclaimed, satisfied with the progress he was seeing.

He then talked to Hikaru directly, "You've behaved quite well! I think I'll give you a little reward!"
11222.title: A different kind of junk food

choices: Hikaru awakens to find that he is untied, with a smorgasboard of food around him
1123.content:
Hikaru licked his lips; he was getting sort of thirsty. "Maybe some diet soda..."

Nodding, several of the servers came forward. Uncapping one of the bottles of soda, they motioned for Hikaru to open his mouth. As Hikaru did so, the servers placed the opening inside his mouth, and tilted the bottle slightly upward.

Hikaru smiled as the sugary liquid was poured down his throat, being careful to keep on swallowing to keep from choking. In a few minutes, the bottle was empty.

"Would you like more, Shindo-kun?" the white-haired man asked. Hikaru nodded eagerly, and more servers came forward, each bearing bottles of soda. One by one, they emptied them into Hikaru's eager mouth.

After the fifth bottle, Hikaru's stomach had swelled out a little bit from all the liquid. Hikaru noticed this and briefly winced, but quickly forgot about it as another server began pouring another bottle down his throat.

About fifteen minutes later, as the 30th and final bottle was emptied into Hikaru's gullet, the servers stepped back. Hikaru groaned, his liquid-engorged belly now enlarged enough to be exerting considerable force against his shorts. It was evident that it couldn't stay like that forever.

Sure enough, Hikaru's pants button blew out, letting the rest of his pants undo themselves and allow his belly to surge outwards. Unable to contain the engorged mass, Hikaru's shirt slid upwards before coming to rest just on top of his stomach. This caused Hikaru's gut to expose itself completely.

Looking down at his swollen belly. Hikaru frowned. "Ah, man. I liked those shorts..." Just then, Hikaru felt something in his stomach, all of the carbonation starting to affect him. Suddenly, he let out a great belch.

Sighing, Hikaru leaned back in the chair, panting. As he sat there, one of the servers came forward and rubbed his exposed belly. Hikaru sighed happily at the soothing sensation. It wasn't long before he fell asleep.

A few hours later...
1123.title: Soda

11232.content:
Hikaru yawned. "Ah man, what a great nap..." He settled a bit into his seat, before he noticed something.

"Hey, I'm not tied up anymore!" Hikaru smiled, happy that he now had some degree of freedom. He looked down at his belly; the carbonation had gone down, and his stomach was once again concealed within his shirt.

"Hikaru, are you alright?" Sai asked, worriedly leaning over the boy.

"Yeah, I'm fine." Hikaru laughed reassuringly. His stomach growled. "Kinda hungry, though..."

As Hikaru's stomach continued to growl, he noticed something in the shadows of the room. Curious, he got up and walked over to investigate.

Hikaru's jaw dropped. Standing before him were literally DOZENS of tables of food, from ice cream to burgers to noodles and everything in between.

Hikaru's eyes lit up. "I-I don't know where to start!" His eyes wandered to a plate of fried chicken. "This'll do..." He set upon the table with a frightening ferocity. Sai raised his fan to protest, but lowered it back down. That was Hikaru...

As time went on, though, Sai noticed something odd; Hikaru had finished off four tables already, but he didn't seem to be getting full in the least. What was more, with every bite of food Hikaru took, his stomach grew, albeit so imperceptibly it would have taken a trained eye to see it. As it was now, Hikaru had a round bulge underneath his shirt, which continued growing.

Sai shook his head. "I have a bad feeling about this..."
11232.title: Hikaru awakens to find that he is untied, with ...

info.brief_description: I noticed there was no Hikaru no Go weight gain, so I made one! 200 GP per good addition!
info.description:
Times are getting fattening for Hikaru, Waya, and the rest of the gang!

There can be no vore, no sex, no violence (okay, maybe in EXTREMELY small doses), and they can't be gay. Aside from that, use your imagination, and enjoy!
